citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 p.m. on
28-SEP-16.
No contact was made with any person at the facility. There is a locked gate at the entrance. The licensee was
contacted by phone and stated she could not be at the facility until at least 3 p.m.
The licensee has declined to provide optimal hours but sent this inspector an email stating availability for inspection
would begin at 1:00 p.m. on 9/28/2016.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 p.m. on
28-SEP-16.
 No contact was made with any person at the facility. There is a locked gate at the entrance. The licensee was
contacted by phone and stated she could not be at the facility until at least 3 p.m.
The licensee has declined to provide optimal hours but sent this inspector an email stating availability for inspection
would begin at  1:00 p.m. on 9/28/2016.
